message: Long story. Client changed their mind on a bunch on site functionality. I had built the site in wordpress which work flawlessly. The new search and Ajax content is in a codeigniter install in a sub directory. Having issues with wordpress htaccess allowing access to the install. Anyone have any experience doing this before?
I'm getting ready to build something similarly structured because of need to accommodate legacy stuff into a new wpmu setup. Need to know the same thing.
